df-dvdsr
blocks.content: Define the (right) divisibility relation in a ring. Access to the left divisibility relation is available through ` ( ||r `` ( oppR `` R ) ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-dvdsr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cdsr, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wrex(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-dvdsr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ ||r =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < s1, s2 > |(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(s3[(√ó ` s0)]s1)= s2))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-unit
blocks.content: Define the set of units in a ring, that is, all elements with a left and right multiplicative inverse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: df-irred
blocks.content: Define the set of irreducible elements in a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-irred(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cir, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cui, cv(s0))), crab(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wne(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-irred(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ Irred =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[((Base ` s0)\(Unit ` s0))/ s1]{ s2 ‚àà s1 | ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,(s3[(√ó ` s0)]s4)‚â† s2))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

blocks.name: reldvdsr
blocks.content: The divides relation is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldvdsr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wrel(c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cdsr, c1))
} = {
  mpbir(wrel(c0), wrel(cfv(cdsr, c1)))
  relmptopab(hs1, hs0, hs3, cdsr, c1, universe, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs3)))))
  df-dvdsr(hs1, hs0, hs3, hs2)
  releqi(c0, cfv(cdsr, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reldvdsr(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(||r ` c1)
} = {
  mpbir(Rel(c0), Rel((||r ` c1)))
  relmptopab(hs1, hs0, hs3, cdsr, c1, universe, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà(Base ` hs1),(hs2[(√ó ` hs1)]hs0)= hs3)))
  df-dvdsr(hs1, hs0, hs3, hs2)
  releqi(c0, (||r ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: dvdsrval
blocks.content: Value of the divides relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsrval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cdsr, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  pm2.61i(wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl5eq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), cfv(cdsr, c3), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, cdsr, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  rexeqdv(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cbs)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  rexbidv(s2, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveqd(cv(s2), cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmulr, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cmulr)
  df-dvdsr(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  opabex3(s0, s1, c1, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cab(s1, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), universe))
  eqeltri(cab(s1, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), universe, cab(s1, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))))))
  abbii(s1, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)))))
  rexbii(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))))
  eqcom(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))
  abrexex(s1, s2, c1, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c3)
  eqtr4d(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(cdsr, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cdsr)
  necon1bi(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), emptycls, wcel(c3, universe))
  sylbi(wne(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), emptycls), wcel(c3, universe), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  opabn0(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wcel(c3, universe))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wcel(c3, universe))
  nsyl2(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  n0i(cv(s0), c1)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cbs, cv(hs0))
  diff.cbs.s(s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dvdsrval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(||r ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(√ó ` c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, d(s2, c2))
  pm2.61i(c0 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c0, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, (||r ` c3), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, cdsr, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1))})
  opabbidv(s0, s1, hs0 = c3, (s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1)), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)))
  bitrd(hs0 = c3, (s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1)), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c3, s0 ‚àà(Base ` hs0), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` hs0),(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1), s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1))
  eleq2d(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c3)
  rexeqdv(s2, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c3, (s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cbs)
  anbi2d(hs0 = c3, s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))
  rexbidv(s2, c1, hs0 = c3, (s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0)= s1, (s2[c2]s0)= s1)
  eqeq1d((s2[(√ó ` hs0)]s0), s1, (s2[c2]s0), hs0 = c3)
  oveqd(s2, (√ó ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((√ó ` hs0), c2, (√ó ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cmulr)
  df-dvdsr(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  opabex3(s0, s1, c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))
  a1i(s0 ‚àà c1, { s1 | ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)} ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltri({ s1 | ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)}, universe, { s1 | ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s1 =(s2[c2]s0))})
  abbii(s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1, s1 =(s2[c2]s0)))
  rexbii(s2, c1, (s2[c2]s0)= s1, s1 =(s2[c2]s0))
  eqcom((s2[c2]s0), s1)
  abrexex(s1, s2, c1, (s2[c2]s0))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c3)
  eqtr4d(c0, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, emptycls, ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (||r ` c3), ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c3, cdsr)
  necon1bi({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))}, emptycls, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylbi({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))} ‚â† ‚àÖ, c3 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)))))
  opabn0(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1)), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  nsyl2(s0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà ùïå, c1 = ‚àÖ)
  n0i(s0, c1)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (Base ` c3), ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c3, cbs)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c2]s0)= s1))})

blocks.origin:
thm dvdsr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c5))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  brrelex12i(c0, c1, c2)
  reldvdsr(c1, c5)
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c3)
  rexlimivw(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl6eqelr(c2, universe, co(cv(s0), c4, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))
  id(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))
  ovex(cv(s0), c4, c0)
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2)))
  eleq1d(cv(hs0), c3, c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  dvdsrval(hs0, hs1, s0, c1, c3, c4, c5)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c0), c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}

thm dvdsr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[c1]c2 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(||r ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(√ó ` c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0[c1]c2, (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2)), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  brrelex12i(c0, c1, c2)
  reldvdsr(c1, c5)
  anim12i(c0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c3)
  rexlimivw(s0, c3, (s0[c4]c0)= c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqelr(c2, universe, (s0[c4]c0), (s0[c4]c0)= c2)
  id((s0[c4]c0)= c2)
  ovex(s0, c4, c0)
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, c1, (c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]hs0)= hs1)))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), hs0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]hs0)= hs1), c0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2))
  eleq1d(hs0, c3, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (s0[c4]hs0)= hs1, (s0[c4]c0)= c2)
  eqeq12d((s0[c4]hs0), hs1, (s0[c4]c0), c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  oveq2d(s0, c4, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  dvdsrval(hs0, hs1, s0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2)))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c3,(s0[c4]c0)= c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)

blocks.name: dvdsrmul
blocks.content: A left-multiple of ` X ` is divisible by ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsrmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, co(c2, c4, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdsr, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c5))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, co(c2, c4, c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wrex(hs0, c1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0))), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(co(c2, c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  eqid(co(c2, c4, c0))
  rspcev(hs0, c2, c1, wceq(co(c2, c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, c4, c0)
  dvdsr(hs0, c0, c3, co(c2, c4, c0), c1, c4, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c2, c4, c0), co(c2, c4, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c4, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c0[c3](c2[c4]c0))

  oveq1(hs0, c2, c4, c0)

  |- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, c3))

}

thm dvdsrcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  an32s(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4))
  3expa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4))

blocks.content: An element in a (unital) ring divides itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)

thm dvdsrid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdsr, c0))
} = {
  breqtrd(c1, c3, c1, co(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c3, co(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), c2))
  id(wcel(c1, c2))
  ringidcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), c2)
  dvdsrmul(c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0), c3, cfv(cmulr, c0), c0)
  ringlidm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))

thm dvdsrneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  syl2anr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c3, co(cfv(c4, cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(cur, c0)), c2))
  id(wcel(c1, c2))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(cur, c0)), c2), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), c2))
  ringgrp(c0)

  grpinvcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), c2, c4)
  dvdsrmul(c1, c2, cfv(c4, cfv(cur, c0)), c3, cfv(cmulr, c0), c0)
  ringnegl(c4, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
}

blocks.name: dvdsr01
blocks.content: In a ring, zero is divisible by all elements. ("Zero divisor" as a term has a somewhat different meaning, see ~ df-rlreg .) (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsr01(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdsr, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c4), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4)))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4)), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4))
  ring0cl(c0, c4, c2)
  ringlz(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cmulr, c0))

  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4, co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wbr(c1, c3, c4), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4))))
  dvdsr2(hs0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: dvdsr02
blocks.content: Only zero is divisible by zero. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsr02(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c3, c4, c1), wceq(c1, c3)))

  bitr4d(wcel(c0, crg), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), c1)), wceq(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c2, wceq(c1, c3)))
  rexbidva(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), c1), wceq(c1, c3))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), c1), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(c3, c1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ringrz(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3)

blocks.name: isunit
blocks.content: Property of being a unit of a ring. A unit is an element that left- and right-divides one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Dec-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isunit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cui, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cdsr, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(coppr, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdsr, c6))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c3)), wcel(c5, universe))
  elexd(c5, cdm(cui), wcel(c0, c1))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cfv(cui, c5), wcel(c5, cdm(cui)))
  elfvdm(c0, cui, c5)
  adantr(wbr(c0, c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c3), wcel(c5, universe))
  sylbi(wbr(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c3), c2))
  df-br(c0, c2, c3)
  elexd(c5, cdm(cdsr), wcel(cop(c0, c3), c2))
  eleq2s(cop(c0, c3), c2, cfv(cdsr, c5), wcel(c5, cdm(cdsr)))
  elfvdm(cop(c0, c3), cdsr, c5)
  syl6bb(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c3)), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3))))
  eleq2d(c0, c1, cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3)), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl5eq(c1, cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3)), cfv(cui, c5), wcel(c5, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c5, universe, cui, cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3)), cima(ccnv(cin(cfv(cdsr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(hs0))))), csn(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)))))
  imaeq12d(ccnv(cin(cfv(cdsr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(hs0))))), csn(cfv(cur, cv(hs0))), ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  cnveqd(cin(cfv(cdsr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(hs0)))), cin(c2, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  ineq12d(cfv(cdsr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(hs0))), c2, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cdsr, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cdsr, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c5, cdsr)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(hs0))), c4, cfv(cdsr, c6), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  fveq2d(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(hs0)), c6, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  syl6eqr(cfv(coppr, cv(hs0)), c6, cfv(coppr, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c5, coppr)
  sneqd(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cur, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c5, cur)
  df-unit(hs0)
  imaex(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3))
  cnvex(cin(c2, c4))
  inex1(c2, c4)
  fvexi(c2, cdsr, c5)
  bitri(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3))), wa(wbr(c0, c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(c0, cin(c2, c4), c3))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3))), wbr(c0, cin(c2, c4), c3)), wrel(cin(c2, c4)))
  mp2(wrel(cin(c2, c4)), wss(cin(c2, c4), c2), wrel(c2))
  inss1(c2, c4)
  reldvdsr(c2, c5)
  relss(cin(c2, c4), c2)
  eliniseg2(cin(c2, c4), c0, c3)
  brin(c0, c2, c4, c3)

  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(cin(c2, c4)), csn(c3)))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0[c2]c3 ‚àß c0[c4]c3))

blocks.name: 1unit
blocks.content: The multiplicative identity is a unit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1unit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, cfv(cdsr, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, crg), wbr(c1, cfv(cdsr, c0), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  dvdsrid(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cdsr, c0))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wbr(c1, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(coppr, c0), crg), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  opprring(c0, cfv(coppr, c0))
  ringidcl(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  dvdsrid(cfv(coppr, c0), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)))
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(coppr, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  isunit(c1, c2, cfv(cdsr, c0), c1, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c0, cfv(coppr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 1unit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Unit ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(1r ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2, c1[(||r ` c0)]c1, c1[(||r `(oppR ` c0))]c1)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1[(||r ` c0)]c1, c1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  dvdsrid(c0, c1, (Base ` c0), (||r ` c0))
  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1[(||r `(oppR ` c0))]c1, (oppR ` c0)‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  opprring(c0, (oppR ` c0))
  ringidcl(c0, c1, (Base ` c0))
  dvdsrid((oppR ` c0), c1, (Base ` c0), (||r `(oppR ` c0)))
  opprbas((Base ` c0), (oppR ` c0), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  isunit(c1, c2, (||r ` c0), c1, (||r `(oppR ` c0)), c0, (oppR ` c0))
  eqid((||r ` c0))
  eqid((oppR ` c0))
  eqid((||r `(oppR ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: unitcl
blocks.content: A unit is an element of the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm unitcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cui, c3))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, c3), cfv(cur, c3)))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, c3), cfv(cur, c3)), wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c3)), cfv(cur, c3)))
  isunit(c0, c1, cfv(cdsr, c3), cfv(cur, c3), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c3)), c3, cfv(coppr, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c3))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c3)))
  dvdsrcl(c0, cfv(cdsr, c3), cfv(cur, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Unit ` c3)
} = {
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2, c0[(||r ` c3)](1r ` c3))
  simplbi(c0 ‚àà c1, c0[(||r ` c3)](1r ` c3), c0[(||r `(oppR ` c3))](1r ` c3))
  isunit(c0, c1, (||r ` c3), (1r ` c3), (||r `(oppR ` c3)), c3, (oppR ` c3))
  eqid((1r ` c3))
  eqid((oppR ` c3))
  eqid((||r `(oppR ` c3)))
  dvdsrcl(c0, (||r ` c3), (1r ` c3), c2, c3)
  eqid((||r ` c3))
}

blocks.name: unitss
blocks.content: The set of units is contained in the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: opprunit
blocks.content: Being a unit is a symmetric property, so it transfers to the opposite ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm opprunit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c1))

  anbi2ci(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c2), cfv(cur, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c1), cfv(cur, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(cur, c2)))

  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, c2))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, c2))))
  rexbii(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, c2)))
  eqeq1i(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cur, c2), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(hs0)))
  eqtr2i(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)))
  opprmul(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), c1, cfv(coppr, c1))
  opprmul(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), c2, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
  dvdsr(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c2), cfv(cur, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cmulr, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c2))
  dvdsr(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(cur, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(coppr, c1))
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(coppr, c1), c1)
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)))
  isunit(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cdsr, c2), cfv(cur, c2), cfv(cdsr, c1), c2, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c2))

  eqid(cfv(cui, c1))

  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)))

  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmulr, c2))

  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(coppr, c1))
}

  eqid((√ó ` c1))

blocks.name: crngunit
blocks.content: Property of being a unit in a commutative ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)

thm crngunit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  rexbidva(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1), c4), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c4))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1), c4, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))))

  eqcomd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1)))
  crngoppr(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(coppr, c0))
  dvdsr(hs0, c1, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(coppr, c0))
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(coppr, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)))
  dvdsr(hs0, c1, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c0)

blocks.name: dvdsunit
blocks.content: A divisor of a unit is a unit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsunit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wbr(c1, c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cdsr, c0))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, ccrg), wbr(c1, c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, c4))
  3imtr4d(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wbr(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, c4), wbr(c3, c2, cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccrg), wbr(c1, c2, c3), wi(wbr(c3, c2, cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0))), wcel(c0, crg))
  crngring(c0)
  3expia(wcel(c0, crg), wbr(c1, c2, c3), wbr(c3, c2, cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0)))
  dvdsrtr(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccrg), wbr(c1, c2, c3), wb(wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c3, c2, cfv(cur, c0))))
  crngunit(c0, c3, c4, c2, cfv(cur, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccrg), wbr(c1, c2, c3), wb(wcel(c1, c4), wbr(c1, c2, cfv(cur, c0))))
  crngunit(c0, c1, c4, c2, cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
}

blocks.name: unitabl
blocks.content: The group of units of a commutative ring is abelian. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm unitabl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cabl))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cabl), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, ccmn))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccmn), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  crngmgp(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, crg))
  crngring(c0)
  unitgrp(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c1)
  subcmn(cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c2)
  isabl(c1)
}

  crngmgp(c0, (mulGrp ` c0))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà CRing, c1 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà Grp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CRing, c1 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  crngring(c0)

  df-invr(hs0)
  fvex(cminusg, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cinvr, c3), cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(cminusg, emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cinvr, c3), cfv(cminusg, emptycls), emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cinvr)

thm unitlinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c2)))
  invrfval(c3, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c2), c2, c0)

thm ringinvdv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), co(c4, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cdvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cinvr, c0))
} = {
  eqtr2d(cfv(c3, c1), co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c4, c5, c1), co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, c1))), wcel(c4, c6))
  ringidcl(c0, c4, c6)
  dvrval(c4, c6, c1, c2, c5, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3, c0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c6))
  ringinvcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6)
  ringlidm(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c6, c4, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
}

thm rngidpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c1), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(cmgp, c1)), w0)
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c1), c2, w0)
  syl6eq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl6eq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  3eqtr3g(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
  ringidval(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  ringidval(cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
}

thm rngidpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(1r ` c0)=(1r ` c1))

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)

  3eqtr4g((1r ` c0), (1r ` c1), (0 `(mulGrp ` c0)), (0 `(mulGrp ` c1)), w0)

  syl6eq(c2, (Base `(mulGrp ` c0)), (Base ` c0), w0)

  eqid((Base ` c1))
  3eqtr3g((s0[(+ `(mulGrp ` c0))]s1), (s0[(+ `(mulGrp ` c1))]s1), (s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1), (s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))
  oveqi(s0, (√ó ` c0), s1, (+ `(mulGrp ` c0)))
  mgpplusg((√ó ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((√ó ` c0))
  oveqi(s0, (√ó ` c1), s1, (+ `(mulGrp ` c1)))
  mgpplusg((√ó ` c1), (mulGrp ` c1), c1)
  eqid((√ó ` c1))
  ringidval((1r ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c0)
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
  ringidval((1r ` c1), (mulGrp ` c1), c1)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)

  3eqtr4g(cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cdsr, c1), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))), w0)
  opabbidv(s1, hs0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))
  3bitr3d(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))
  rexbidva(s0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))

thm dvdsrpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(||r ` c0)=(||r ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(||r ` c0)=(||r ` c1)), d(s1, c2))
  3eqtr4g((||r ` c0), (||r ` c1), { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)= hs0))}, { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1)= hs0))}, w0)

blocks.content: The set of units depends only on the ring's base set and multiplication operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2014.)

thm unitpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cui, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cui, c1), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cui, c1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c1), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(cur, c1))))
  bitrd(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c1), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(cur, c1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c1))))
  anbi12d(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c1)))
  breq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c1), w0)
  breq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c1), w0)
  rngidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  anbi12d(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c1), cfv(cur, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(cur, c1)))
  breqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cdsr, c1), w0)
  dvdsrpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  breqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), w0)
  dvdsrpropd(s1, s0, cfv(coppr, c0), cfv(coppr, c1), c2, w0)
  syl6eq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(coppr, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(coppr, c0), c0)
  syl6eq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(coppr, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(coppr, c1), c1)
  3eqtr4g(co(cv(s1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  ancom2s(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  opprmul(cv(s1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, cfv(coppr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)))
  opprmul(cv(s1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)), cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1, cfv(coppr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c1)))
  isunit(cv(hs0), cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cdsr, c0), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c0, cfv(coppr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c0)))
  isunit(cv(hs0), cfv(cui, c1), cfv(cdsr, c1), cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)), c1, cfv(coppr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cui, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cui, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, coppr, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, coppr, c1)
  diff.coppr.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, coppr, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, coppr, c1)
  diff.coppr.s(s0)
}

thm unitpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(Unit ` c0)=(Unit ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (Unit ` c0), (Unit ` c1), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Unit ` c0), hs0 ‚àà(Unit ` c1), (hs0[(||r ` c0)](1r ` c0)‚àß hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c0))](1r ` c0)), (hs0[(||r ` c1)](1r ` c1)‚àß hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c1))](1r ` c1)))
  bitrd(w0, (hs0[(||r ` c0)](1r ` c0)‚àß hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c0))](1r ` c0)), (hs0[(||r ` c1)](1r ` c1)‚àß hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c1))](1r ` c1)), (hs0[(||r ` c0)](1r ` c1)‚àß hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c0))](1r ` c1)))
  anbi12d(w0, hs0[(||r ` c0)](1r ` c0), hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c0))](1r ` c0), hs0[(||r ` c0)](1r ` c1), hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c0))](1r ` c1))
  breq2d(hs0, (||r ` c0), (1r ` c0), (1r ` c1), w0)
  breq2d(hs0, (||r `(oppR ` c0)), (1r ` c0), (1r ` c1), w0)
  rngidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  anbi12d(w0, hs0[(||r ` c0)](1r ` c1), hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c0))](1r ` c1), hs0[(||r ` c1)](1r ` c1), hs0[(||r `(oppR ` c1))](1r ` c1))
  breqd(hs0, (||r ` c0), (1r ` c1), (||r ` c1), w0)
  dvdsrpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  breqd(hs0, (||r `(oppR ` c0)), (1r ` c1), (||r `(oppR ` c1)), w0)
  dvdsrpropd(s1, s0, (oppR ` c0), (oppR ` c1), c2, w0)
  syl6eq(c2, (Base `(oppR ` c0)), (Base ` c0), w0)
  opprbas((Base ` c0), (oppR ` c0), c0)
  syl6eq(c2, (Base `(oppR ` c1)), (Base ` c1), w0)
  opprbas((Base ` c1), (oppR ` c1), c1)
  3eqtr4g((s1[(√ó `(oppR ` c0))]s0), (s1[(√ó `(oppR ` c1))]s0), (s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1), (s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1), (w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)))
  ancom2s(w0, s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c2, (s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  opprmul(s1, (√ó `(oppR ` c0)), s0, (√ó ` c0), (Base ` c0), c0, (oppR ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((√ó ` c0))
  eqid((√ó `(oppR ` c0)))
  opprmul(s1, (√ó `(oppR ` c1)), s0, (√ó ` c1), (Base ` c1), c1, (oppR ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((√ó ` c1))
  eqid((√ó `(oppR ` c1)))
  isunit(hs0, (Unit ` c0), (||r ` c0), (1r ` c0), (||r `(oppR ` c0)), c0, (oppR ` c0))
  eqid((Unit ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
  eqid((||r ` c0))
  eqid((oppR ` c0))
  eqid((||r `(oppR ` c0)))
  isunit(hs0, (Unit ` c1), (||r ` c1), (1r ` c1), (||r `(oppR ` c1)), c1, (oppR ` c1))
  eqid((Unit ` c1))
  eqid((1r ` c1))
  eqid((||r ` c1))
  eqid((oppR ` c1))
  eqid((||r `(oppR ` c1)))
  diff.hs0.c((Unit ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((Unit ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, coppr, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, coppr, c1)
  diff.coppr.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, coppr, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, coppr, c1)
  diff.coppr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: invrpropd

thm invrpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cinvr, c0), cfv(cinvr, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cinvr, c0), cfv(cinvr, c1), cfv(cminusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0))), cfv(cminusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1))), w0)
  grpinvpropd(s0, s1, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)), co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1)), cfv(cui, c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)))))
  unitgrpbas(cfv(cui, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)), c0)
  syl6eq(cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1))), cfv(cui, c1), w0)
  unitpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  unitgrpbas(cfv(cui, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1)), c1)
  3eqtr3g(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0))), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1))), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cui, c0)))))
  syldan(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cui, c0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  anim12dan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  sselda(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c0), c2, w0)
  sselda(cv(s1), cfv(cui, c0), c2, w0)
  syl5sseqr(cfv(cui, c0), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  unitss(cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cplusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)))), wcel(cfv(cui, c0), universe))
  fvex(cui, c0)
  ressplusg(cfv(cui, c0), universe, cfv(cmulr, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, cfv(cui, c0)), cfv(cmgp, c0))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1))))

  eqid(cfv(cui, c1))
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, cfv(cui, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cinvr, c1))

blocks.name: isirred
blocks.content: An irreducible element of a ring is a non-unit that is not the product of two non-units. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: irredlmul
blocks.content: The product of a unit and an irreducible element is irreducible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)

  syl3an1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c0)), c1), c4), wcel(cfv(coppr, c0), crg))
  opprring(c0, cfv(coppr, c0))

blocks.name: irredmul
blocks.content: If product of two elements is irreducible, then one of the elements must be a unit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm irredmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c4)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cir, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cui, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c6))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c4), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)))
  syl5(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c4), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))))
  simp3bi(wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c4), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c1), wn(wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c5)))
  isirred2(hs0, hs1, co(c0, c3, c2), c4, c1, c5, c3, c6)
  mpii(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c2)))
  eqid(co(c0, c3, c2))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c1, wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5)), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3, cv(hs1))
  orbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5), wcel(c0, c5))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c5)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5)))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0, c3)
  orbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c2, c5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, c3, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(hs1)), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c0[c3]c2)‚àà c4)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c5))

  ‚ä£ c3 =(√ó ` c6)
} = {

  syl5((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (c0[c3]c2)‚àà c4, (c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c5), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((hs0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2)‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5)))))
  simp3bi((c0[c3]c2)‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((hs0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2)‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5)))), (c0[c3]c2)‚àà c1, ¬¨(c0[c3]c2)‚àà c5)
  isirred2(hs0, hs1, (c0[c3]c2), c4, c1, c5, c3, c6)
  mpii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((hs0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2)‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5)))), (c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c5), (c0[c3]c2)=(c0[c3]c2))
  eqid((c0[c3]c2))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c1, ((hs0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2)‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5)), ((c0[c3]c2)=(c0[c3]c2)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c5)), ((c0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2), (hs0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5), (c0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2), (c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5))
  eqeq1d((hs0[c3]hs1), (c0[c3]c2), (c0[c3]hs1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, c3, hs1)
  orbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚àà c5, hs1 ‚àà c5, c0 ‚àà c5)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c5)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c2, (c0[c3]hs1)=(c0[c3]c2), (c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® hs1 ‚àà c5), (c0[c3]c2)=(c0[c3]c2), (c0 ‚àà c5 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c5))
  eqeq1d((c0[c3]hs1), (c0[c3]c2), (c0[c3]c2), hs1 = c2)
  oveq2(hs1, c2, c0, c3)
  orbi2d(hs1 = c2, c0 ‚àà c5, hs1 ‚àà c5, c2 ‚àà c5)
  eleq1(hs1, c2, c5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: irredneg
blocks.content: The negative of an irreducible element is irreducible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm irredneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cir, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cminusg, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cfv(c3, c1), c2, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, cfv(cur, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  rngnegr(c1, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  irredcl(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, cfv(cur, c0))), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0)))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0)), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0)))
  1unit(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  unitnegcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cui, c0), c3)
  irredrmul(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c3, cfv(cur, c0)), cfv(cui, c0), cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
}

blocks.name: irrednegb
blocks.content: An element is irreducible iff its negative is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm irrednegb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cir, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c3))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c3))
  irredneg(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  eqeltrrd(c1, c3, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c3)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ringgrp(c0)
  grpinvinv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c3), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c3))
  irredneg(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c3, c4)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî(c4 ` c1)‚àà c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Irred ` c0)

  impbida((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c1 ‚àà c3, (c4 ` c1)‚àà c3)

  adantr((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` c1)‚àà c3, (c4 `(c4 ` c1))= c1)
